Name: Cybxus Heart
About the game: What's it about Cybxus Hearts inspired by classic Japanese shooting games. This is a game where you control three different characters at the same time. You can swap between characters depending on situation. But protect your central core with the all cost! Features Classic danmaku-like bullet hell 4 stages packed with enemies and bullets Control 3 characters with different powers and weaknesses Epic boss battles with different bullet patterns Multiple modes of difficulty that caters to players of all skill ranges
